name: Kelen
appearance: Tall, angular elf with prismatic goggles, ink-black hair braided with copper wire, and a coat pocket full of crystal slivers that catch blue light.
character: Visionary lenswright who believes risk is the price of civic dawns; impatient with ‘safe’ minds.
talents: spots microfractures in glass by fingertip
dreams: complete a citywide focusing ring to tame the Blue Maw
prove the Artificers deserve an independent charter
etch a lens that lets voices be heard across the bay without horns
secrets: authorized a hidden prototype mount beneath the Diadem without full consent
signed a hush lien with the Ledger on personal collateral
quietly paid damages after a failed test singed a bell tower
